column4: i am trying to update my wifi driver can someone please help. i have never done this beforae nd i am a noob
it comes with a makefile and it is raelly confusing

if i am correct i have to run the rmmod commands
btw why these drivers the one in repo dont work?
did you see the error i get?
use sudo when you get permission denied, are the makes working fine?
do rmmods and then do the insmod
i get the same error: insmod: error inserting 'wl.ko': -1 File exists
are you sure you have the correct tar ball?
ok , after modprobe, do the insmod with the correct path, sudo insmod <path>/<filename>
